TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ScriptManagerDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner

summary.span: 在視覺化設計工具中，提供 控制項的設計階段支援。

span.span: Provides design-time support for the control in a visual designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需詳細資訊，請參閱類別文件。For more information, see the class documentation.

related.span: 逐步解說：建立基本的控制項設計工具的 Web 伺服器控制項

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]在內部建立的新執行個體類別建立關聯時控制項或該控制項的設計介面上的複本。The [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] internally constructs a new instance of the class when it creates the associated control or a copy of that control on the design surface.

span.span: Returns the HTML markup that represents the control at design time.

returns.span: 用來在設計階段呈現 的標記。

span.span: The markup that is used to render the at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 覆寫此方法以變更產生的 HTML 的控制項在設計階段。Override this method to change the generated HTML of the control at design time.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection<System.Web.UI.ScriptReference> GetScriptReferences (System.Web.UI.ScriptManager scriptManager, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy> proxies);

.method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1<class System.Web.UI.ScriptReference> GetScriptReferences(class System.Web.UI.ScriptManager scriptManager, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy> proxies) cil managed

public: static System::Collections::ObjectModel::ReadOnlyCollection<System::Web::UI::ScriptReference ^> ^ GetScriptReferences(System::Web::UI::ScriptManager ^ scriptManager, System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<System::Web::UI::ScriptManagerProxy ^> ^ proxies);
static member GetScriptReferences : System.Web.UI.ScriptManager * seq<System.Web.UI.ScriptManagerProxy> -> System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection<System.Web.UI.ScriptReference>

param.name: scriptManager
param.span: 與網頁相關聯的 控制項。

span.span: The control that is associated with the Web page.

param.name: proxies
param.span: 與網頁相關聯的 控制項集合。

span.span: The collection of controls associated with the Web page.

summary.span: 傳回網頁 控制項和 控制項中定義之所有 控制項的集合。

span.span: Returns a collection of all controls that are defined in a Web page's control and controls.
A read-only collection of controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 則會傳回的集合包含 framework 指令碼，會自動傳送給用戶端來支援 AJAX 功能，例如和控制項。The collection that is returned includes framework scripts that are sent automatically to the client to support AJAX functionality such as the and control. 當您使用方法中，注意下列指導方針：When you use the method, be aware of the following guidelines: - 物件具有相同和屬性會移除重複項目。 objects with the same and properties are removed as duplicates. - 物件具有相同，不會移除重複項目以在設計階段。 objects with the same are not removed as duplicates at design time. 不過，它們會移除重複項目在執行階段。However, they are removed as duplicates at run time. - 方法用來傳回完整的 URL，如屬性物件。The method is used to return a fully qualified URL for the property of a object. - 傳回集合中的物件是原始的指令碼參考的複製的版本，因此無法修改設計工具的程式碼中使用此集合。The objects in the returned collection are cloned versions of the original script references and therefore cannot be modified in designer code by using this collection.

span.span: is .
